import React from 'react'; import {Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid, StylesProvider} from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; const Cards = ({confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate}) => { if(!data.confirmed){ return 'Loading...' } return (
Infected {confirmed.value} REAL DATE Number of active cases of COVID-19 Recovered {recovered.value} REAL DATE Number of recoveries from COVID-19 Deaths {deaths.value} REAL DATE Number of deaths from COVID-19
) } export default Cards;
